00001 #ifndef _ESM_RACE_H
00002 #define _ESM_RACE_H
00003 
00004 #include "esm_reader.hpp"
00005 
00006 namespace ESM {
00007 
00008 /*
00009  * Race definition
00010  */
00011 
00012 struct Race
00013 {
00014   struct SkillBonus
00015   {
00016     int skill; // SkillEnum
00017     int bonus;
00018   };
00019 
00020   struct MaleFemale
00021   {
00022     int male, female;
00023   };
00024 
00025   struct MaleFemaleF
00026   {
00027     float male, female;
00028   };
00029 
00030   enum Flags
00031     {
00032       Playable  = 0x01,
00033       Beast     = 0x02
00034     };
00035 
00036   struct RADTstruct
00037   {
00038     // List of skills that get a bonus
00039     SkillBonus bonus[7];
00040 
00041     // Attribute values for male/female
00042     MaleFemale strength, intelligence, willpower, agility,
00043       speed, endurance, personality, luck;
00044 
00045     // The actual eye level height (in game units) is (probably) given
00046     // as 'height' times 128. This has not been tested yet.
00047     MaleFemaleF height, weight;
00048 
00049     int flags; // 0x1 - playable, 0x2 - beast race
00050 
00051     // Size = 140 bytes
00052   };
00053 
00054   RADTstruct data;
00055 
00056   std::string name, description;
00057   SpellList powers;
00058 
00059   void load(ESMReader &esm)
00060   {
00061     name = esm.getHNString("FNAM");
00062     esm.getHNT(data, "RADT", 140);
00063     powers.load(esm);
00064     description = esm.getHNOString("DESC");
00065   }
00066 };
00067 }
00068 #endif
